verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, I love You.
Jesus, I am Yours.
Your servant, Lord,
Abandoned to Your will.
I belong to You; I'm Yours.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let Your precious Spirit flow through me.
Let Your pure love redeem through me.
Let Your perfect peace flow out.
May the joy of God bubble out,
Till only You can be seen.
